item.title: Contact
item.description: I prefer GPG encrypted emails. f.janus@gmail.com My GPG key fingerprint 1E28 8B33 06B0 9DC4 33F4 1507 5F7B 978E A457 58B0 My key can be downloaded from the keyserver-pool or from the local copy.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal page of Frantisek Janus. I am IT professional living in ZÃ¼rich area. The content of this page is focused on technical topics, mainly from my work or about topics which interests me. You can find 2 main content sections here: 1. Notes - intended to be one long structured document with my notes. 2. Blog - posts where I would like to go a little deeper or to be more verbose
